title: Megami-ryou no Ryoubo-kun. (Mother of the Goddess' Dormitory)
synopsis: Twelve-year-old Koushi Nagumo's life suddenly goes downhill when his father abandons him after their house burns down. Left to fend for himself, Koushi collapses on the street, but an eccentric woman named Mineru Wachi takes pity on him and brings him to the female dormitory "Megami-ryou."
characters: ['Saotome, Atena', 'Nagumo, Koushi', 'Hozumi, Serene', 'Frey', 'Kouroya, Sutea', 'Senshou, Kiriya', 'Wachi, Mineru']
voices: ['Nanase, Ayaka', 'Yamada, Misuzu', 'Yomichi, Yuki', 'Fukuyama, Asaki', 'Nanjou, Hikaru', 'Murai, Risako', 'Takahashi, Chiaki']
staff: [['Nakajuu, Shunsuke', ['Director']], ['Yomichi, Yuki', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Hino, Ikumi', ['Original Creator']], ['Okada, Maiko', ['Character Design']]]
